item.title: How I Focus While Coding
item.description: Source Many people recommend time boxing methods like Pomodoro Technique: 25m work followed by 5m break. But it doesn’t work well with coding (at least for him), where your train of thoughts or flow state will be lost every 25 minutes and you have to start all over again.

item.title: Choose Boring Technology
item.description: src: https://boringtechnology.club Summary The answer of “How do you make devs happy?” for many developers: Chase shiny objects Imagine you have “Innovation Tokens” to use for building new things, and you have 3 tokens to use.

item.title: How to learn hard things in tech
item.description: Source Summary Don’t know where to start on new/hard tech? Build. Find the example, use it as the baseline for building Modify, see results If it doesn’t work, read or watch someone explain it Repeat Force yourself to do 1.
